1523430.name: Aerofly FS 2 - France VFR - Paris-Ile-de-France Airport Pack
1523430.description:
The Paris-Ile de France VFR Airport Pack is an extension for the base VFR product that requires to be installed first. The product adds 11 detailed airports and airfields to the base product for the best VFR experience over Paris and its region.

Each airport features ground textures from 0,25 to 0,50 meters.

This is the list of airports
  • LFAI Nangis
  • LFFB Buno Bonnevaux
  • LFFQ La Ferté Alais
  • LFPE Meaux Esbly
  • LFPF Beynes Thiverval
  • LFPH Chelles Le Pin
  • LFPK Coulommiers Voisins
  • LFPQ Fontenay Trésigny
  • LFPU Moret Episy
  • LFPX Chavenay Villepreu
  • LFXU Les Mureaux
1523430.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
